title: Bayer Separates Material Science Business Covestro
text:
LEVERKUSEN, Germany—German pharmaceuticals group Bayer AG on Tuesday moved a step closer to floating its €11 billion ($12.38 billion) specialty chemicals business by legally and economically separating the unit, now named Covestro AG.
